p: The effects of A. annua floral essential oil on digestive enzymes’ activity of G. pyloalis larvae was manifested by a decrease in protease, α-glucosidase, β-glucosidase, α-amylase, and lipase contents. The difference was significant between the LC 50 versus the control in both oral and fumigant applications while other concentrations of the essential oil produced intermediate responses ( Table 4).
